targets.rawSql:
-- Select current_program_name as value from dmg_data WHERE machine_id = '$machine_id' and $__timeFilter(time)  ORDER BY time DESC;
Select
  machine_status as value
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time desc
limit 1;

Select
  start_up as value
from
  dmg_data
WHERE
  machine_id = '$machine_id' and $__timeFilter(time) 
ORDER BY
  time DESC
LIMIT
  1;

Select
  total_number as value
from
  dmg_data
WHERE
  machine_id = '$machine_id' and $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY
  time DESC
LIMIT
  1;

Select
  total_number*60*60*24/total_cutting_time as value
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time desc
limit
  1;

Select
  case when start_up = 0 then 0 else current_run_time*100/(start_up*60) end as value
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time desc
limit
  1;

Select
  total_cutting_time as value
from
  dmg_data
WHERE
  machine_id = '$machine_id' and $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY
  time DESC
LIMIT
  1;

Select
  current_run_time as value
from
  dmg_data
WHERE
  machine_id = '$machine_id' and $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY
  time DESC
LIMIT
  1;

Select
  current_cycle as value
from
  dmg_data
WHERE
  machine_id = '$machine_id' and $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY
  time DESC
LIMIT
  1;

-- Select current_program_name as value from dmg_data WHERE machine_id = '$machine_id' and $__timeFilter(time)  ORDER BY time DESC;
Select
  program_status::text as value
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time desc
limit 1;

Select
  tool_name,
  tool_radius,
  tool_length
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time desc
limit
  1;

-- Select current_program_name as value from dmg_data WHERE machine_id = '$machine_id' and $__timeFilter(time)  ORDER BY time DESC;
Select
  time,
  program_status::text
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time;

SELECT sum(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM delta_T)) as value
from(
SELECT
  on_segment,
  MAX(time) - MIN(time) AS delta_T
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      time,
      SUM(on_id) OVER (
        ORDER BY
          time
      ) AS on_segment
    FROM
      (
        SELECT
          time,
          CASE
            WHEN machine_status = 'on'
            AND LAG(machine_status) OVER (
              ORDER BY
                time
            ) != 'on' THEN 1
            ELSE 0
          END AS on_id
        FROM
          dmg_data
        where
          machine_id = '$machine_id'
          and $__timeFilter(time)
      )
  )
GROUP BY
  on_segment
  );

Select
  driveload_x, driveload_y, driveload_z, driveload_c, driveload_a
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time desc
limit
  1;

Select
  time, spindle_load
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time;

-- Select current_program_name as value from dmg_data WHERE machine_id = '$machine_id' and $__timeFilter(time)  ORDER BY time DESC;
Select
  current_program_name
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time desc
limit
  1;

Select
  spindle_speed
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time desc
limit
  1;

-- Select current_program_name as value from dmg_data WHERE machine_id = '$machine_id' and $__timeFilter(time)  ORDER BY time DESC;
Select
  current_program_content
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time desc
limit
  1;

Select
  x_axis_coordinate as X_axis,
  y_axis_coordinate as Y_axis,
  z_axis_coordinate as Z_axis,
  a_axis_coordinate as A_axis,
  c_axis_coordinate as C_axis
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time desc
limit
  1;

Select
  spindle_feed
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time desc
limit
  1;

Select
  feed_override
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time desc
limit
  1;

Select
  spindle_override
from
  dmg_data
where
  machine_id = '$machine_id'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
order by
  time desc
limit
  1;
